mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.number, s.belong_id AS belongId, s.sort, s.attachment_id AS attachmentId, s.create_by AS createBy, s.create_time AS createTime, s.update_by AS updateBy, s.update_time AS updateTime, a.filename AS fileName, a.filesize AS fileSize, a.filetype AS fileType, a.filepath AS filePath, a.file_id AS fileId FROM seo_video s JOIN system_attachment a ON s.attachment_id=a.id WHERE s.belong_id=#{belongId} ORDER BY s.sort,s.create_time
